summary: Improved Necromancer\'s Amulet as per series lore.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim\'s default version of the Necromancer\'s Amulet is pretty underwhelming, so I buffed it as per lore descriptions from past games. While it is intended for higher-level or otherwise difficult gameplay, it shouldn\'t be overpowered - just a very good Mage item, as it should be.

New effects are as follows:

(changed name to Necromancer\'s Amulet)

+75 Magicka
Conjuration spells cost 25% less to cast
Health regens 25% faster
Magicka regens 35% faster
author: Kyuukei
